attributes.action: force all ramblers/walkers to wave a red flag when walking on a "public road"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
force all ramblers/walkers to wave a red flag when walking on a "public road".
This increases a walkers safety when rambling on byways open to all traffic. Waving of a flag whilst walking on these unsurfaced roads/lanes may help prevent farmers, bikes and recreational offroaders from not seeing a walker dressed in green waterproofs and causing an unfortunate accident.
